description: This file defines the CacheSubnetGroup class, which manages AWS ElastiCache subnet groups, including creation, reading, updating, and deletion operations. It interacts with AWS SDK components and handles subnet ID retrieval from references or VPC stacks.

classes.name: CacheSubnetGroup
classes.description: A class representing an AWS ElastiCache subnet group, providing methods to create, read, update, and delete the resource, as well as retrieve subnet IDs from various sources.

methods.name: get_subnet_ids
methods.description: Retrieves subnet IDs for the cache subnet group, either from a list, a reference, or by querying a VPC stack for private and public subnets.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the cache subnet group in AWS using provided subnet IDs and optional tags.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the cache subnet group from AWS.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the cache subnet group from AWS.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates the cache subnet group in AWS with new subnet IDs or description.
